When any number of your [Alt] personnel facing a dilemma
are about to be killed, destroy a non-Hand Weapon

name: Call of the Nagus
effect:
Download three [Fer] personnel. Choose an opponent
to select two of those personnel to be placed beneath
your Ferenginar (discard them if you do not command
Ferenginar). Then place the other personnel in your hand.
Destroy this event.

"Now, are you going to defy the wishes of the Grand Nagus himself?"
"No, no, of course not. I'm happy to serve the Nagus any way I can."

name: Call to Arms
effect:
Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving two of your personnel who both have a cost of 4
or more, score 10 points.

"No crew in Starfleet has been tested more in battle. I know I can count on each of you to perform your duty to the best of your ability. Nothing will impede our march toward victory. Long live the Empire."

name: Captain's Log
effect:
Plays in your core. While facing a dilemma, you may
exclude your corresponding Commander aboard his or her
ship from random selections.

"Captain's log, supplemental. Our orbit: tightening. Our need for efficiency: critical."

effect:
Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are placed in your opponent's brig. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

"We must not give up. The first duty of any captured officer is to attempt escape."

name: Preventative Repercussions
effect:
Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of
those personnel is 5 or less, they are killed. Otherwise,
randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

"There's been an attack on Earth. ... A probe. They don't know where it came from."

name: Quark, Simple Barkeep
effect: Ferengi
• Anthropology • Diplomacy • Honor • Programming

Smuggler. When you play this personnel, you may
download a card an place it beneath your Ferenginar. At
the start of each of your turns, you may place one of your
non-[Fer] personnel present on the bottom of his or her
owner's deck to spend 2 additional counters this turn.
"Gold-pressed what?"
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 7 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 4

name: Reflections
effect:
Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal
to the number of [Alt] cards your opponent commands. For
each event or interrupt revealed, your opponent chooses a
personnel to be stopped.

"I lured you away from Engineering with the promise of a sexual encounter ... Once we were alone in my quarters, I implanted a telepathic suggestion ... I compelled you to sabotage the power grid."

name: Rekar, Tool of the Tal'Shiar
effect: Romulan

• Astrometrics • Engineer • Intelligence
• Leadership • Officer • Security

Commander: U.S.S. Prometheus. When you play this
personnel, if you command an Intelligence personnel, he is
cost -1. When your [Rom] personnel present who has a cost
of 4 or more attempts a non-[Rom] mission, subtract one from
the number of dilemmas your opponent can draw.
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 4 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 6

name: Revised Chakotay, Imposturous First Officer
effect:
Hologram

• Anthropology • Honor • Officer • Security

When one of your personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card titled Chakotay
or Revised Chakotay from hand to prevent that.
"I'm a man of peace. My native people are enlightened, non-violent, much like your own. I'm saddened that this had happened to you. If we can work together, maybe we can end this conflict."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 6

name: Revised Doctor, Mass Murderer
effect:
Hologram

• Biology • Exobiology • Medical • Science
• 2 Treachery

Order — Discard a card titled The Doctor or Revised Doctor
from hand to download an interrupt.
"We have established a data-link between my neural net and the phaser array. I am reconfiguring the beam to carry a bio-agent into the planet's atmosphere.
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 1 CUNNING 8 STRENGTH 4

name: Revised Janeway, Cold-Blooded Killer
effect:
Hologram

• Leadership • Officer • Science • 2 Treachery

While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard
a card titled Kathryn Janeway or Revised Janeway from
hand to make her Cunning +5 and Strength +5 until the
end of that dilemma.
"When diplomacy fails, there's only one alternative – violence. Force must be applied without apology. It's the Starfleet way."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 1 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 5

name: Revised Kim, Interrogator
effect:
Hologram

• Officer • Programming • Security • 2 Treachery

While this personnel is facing a mission, you may discard
a Hologram from hand to give him one of the discarded
Hologram's skills until the end of this mission attempt.
"Look, I can keep this up all day. Tell the Commander what he wants to know."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 2 CUNNING 5 STRENGTH 6

name: Revised Neelix, Hedgehog Ops Officer
effect:
Hologram

• Astrometrics • Biology • Physics • Programming
• Science • Transporters • 2 Treachery

While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard
a card titled Neelix or Revised Neelix from hand to make
each of your Treachery personnel present attributes +1
until the end of this dilemma.
"Approximately three thousand Kyrians dead."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 2 CUNNING6 STRENGTH 4

effect:
Hologram

• Astrometrics • 2 Navigation • Treachery

Order — Discard a card titled Tom Paris or Revised Paris from
hand to make each of your [Fut] [Voy] Holograms gains [Com] until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.
"No one behaved like this. Well, aside from Mister Paris."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 3 CUNNING 5 STRENGTH 6

name: Revised Seven of Nine, Shock-Trooper
effect:
Hologram

• Engineer • 2 Security

Order — Discard a card titled Seven of Nine or Revised
Seven of Nine from hand to choose one: place a personnel
present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck; or take a
[Fut] [Voy] Hologram from your discard pile into hand.
"Two of the Kyrians are still alive. What shall we do with them?"
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 5 CUNNING 5 STRENGTH 7

name: Revised Tuvok, Evil Instrument of Destruction
effect:
Hologram

• Engineer • Security • 2 Treachery

At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card
titled Tuvok or Revised Tuvok from hand to download a
[Fut] [Voy] Hologram.
"The bio-agent is still dispersing through the atmosphere. The fatality rate will be three hundred thousand soon enough."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 1 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 7

name: Rom, Professional Soldier
effect: Ferengi
• Geology • Navigation • Physics • Science

While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may exchange
two cards in hand with an interrupt beneath your Ferenginar.
"I say we teach the Alliance a lesson. Throw everything we've got at Terok Nor and rip it up to pieces."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 4

name: Sabotaged Transporter
effect:
Plays in your core. When a dilemma you own is about to stop
a personnel, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4
or more from hand to kill that personnel instead.

Via direct sabotage or accidental equipment malfunction,
converting the body into billions of kiloquads of data and zipping there through subspace can be dangerous.

name: Seasoned Leader
effect:
To play this event, you must command three [Alt] [Stf] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, you may choose one: draw a card; download a [Stf] Leadership personnel; or shuffle up to two cards from hand into their owner's deck.

Command is often decided by force or treachery rather than
logic or rules.

name: Security Weapons
effect:
Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that
personnel has a cost of 2 or less, kill him or her instead.

"I'm detecting some kind of movement. ... It's heading in your direction. Moving fast."

name: Shattered
effect:
Unless you have Anthropology, Leadership, and Science
or Engineer, Transporters, and Cunning>28, randomly
select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your
left does not command a headquarters mission, he or she
may take a [Voy] personnel from his or her discard pile and
place him or her aboard a ship at a [Delta] mission.

"Different areas seem to exist in different time periods."

name: Six of Ten, Invalidation Drone
effect:
Borg

• Astrometrics • Leadership • Navigation
• Officer • Security

Drone. When you play this personnel, if you command a
unique pesonnel, he is cost -1. At the start of each of your
turns, you may discard a card from hand that has a cost of
4 or more to download a card that has a cost of 4 or more.
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 5 STRENGTH 6

effect: Gorn

• 2 Engineer • Physics • Programming
• Security • Treachery

This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each
[Alt] personnel present.
"I'm familiar with your species. Humans are not trustworthy."

effect: Vulcan
• Programming • Science

While you have no cards in hand, this personnel gains
Biology, Exobiology, and Geology.
"I'm too old to become a revolutionary."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 6

effect:
Human/Vulcan

• Engineer • Honor • Programming • Science
• Transporters

While you command an [Alt] personnel, you may play this
personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel
from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel
could be played.
"I do not desire the captaincy. I much prefer my scientific duties."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 8 STRENGTH 7

name: Standard Punishment
effect:
When your personnel is attempting a mission, make each
of your [Alt] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this
mission attempt.

"The agony booth is a most effective means of disciple."

name: Strange New Worlds
effect:
Plays on an opponent's mission. Replace this mission's
requirements (and alternate requirements in game text) with
Anthropology, Diplomacy, Law, and Integrity>32.

"You should learn to objectify other cultures, so you know when to interfere, and when not to."

name: T'Pol, Dutiful Commander
effect: Vulcan

• Engineer • Officer • Science • Security
• Treachery
"It was my duty to help Captain Forrest regain command."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 4 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 6

name: T'Pol, Not a Slave
effect: Vulcan

• Anthropology • Astrometrics • Engineer
• Leadership • Officer • Programming • Science

When you play this personnel, if you command an Officer
personnel, this personnel is cost -1. While you have no
cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1.
"A parallel universe? The Science Directorate has examined all of these theories. They've found no evidence of alternate realities."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 4 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 6

name: Telok, Bodyguard
effect: Klingon

• Astrometrics • Leadership • Programming
• Security

When you play this personnel, if you command three
[Alt] cards, draw up to two cards.
"What's wrong, Terran? Lost your nerve? Afraid to die today, eh?"
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 4 CUNNING 5 STRENGTH 7

name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon
effect:
Temporal. Plays on a mission. At the start of each
player's turn, that player removes a personnel he or she
commands at this mission from the game and moves this
event to a different mission. When this event is placed on a
headquarters mission, remove it from the game.

"It was like ... being inside joy. As if joy were something tangible, and you could wrap yourself up in it like a blanket."

name: The Dal'Rok
effect:
Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for
each headquarters mission you command, randomly select
a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its
owner's dilemma pile.

"Many years ago, this village was deeply divided by hate and mistrust. The first Sirah knew that unless he could find a way to unite the people, the village would destroy itself. So he used the Orb fragment as a catalyst to give their fears a physical form."

name: The Inner Light
effect:
To play this event, you must command no [Bor] cards. Plays
in your core. When you play this event, you may play an
[Alt] personnel aboard your ship. That personnel loses each
of his or her icons (except for [Alt] and those in game text),
gains [Stff], and becomes [Non]. When this event is destroyed,
kill that personnel.

"Where is this...?"

name: The Secret War
effect:
Unless you have Honor, Officer, and Integrity>34
or Security, Treachery, and Strength>34, randomly
select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on
your left commands Athos IV, that personnel is returned to
his or her owner's hand instead.

"I'm sorry we won't be working together, Benjamin ... like
old times."

name: These Are The Voyages
effect:
Draw a number of cards equal to the cost of one of your
personnel, then place three cards from hand on the bottom
of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

"Up until about 100 years ago, there was one question that
burned in every human, that made us study the stars and dream of traveling to them. Are we alone? ... We are all explorers driven to know what's over the horizon, what's beyond our own shores."

name: To Be a Warrior
effect:
Plays in your core. When your Klingon who has a cost of
4 or more is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may
destroy this event instead.

"Ch'Targh might have cut him a little, maybe broken a few
bones, but nothing more. You say Alexander never wanted to
become a warrior. Clearly he has changed his mind."

name: Tomek, Displaced Alien
effect: Alien
• Engineer • Honor • Physics • Security
You may play this personnel aboard your [Rom] ship. When you play an [Alt] personnel, you may discard an [Alt] card from hand to download an interrupt.
"Yes ... our young ... are trapped ... We must get them out ... return them ..."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 5

name: Travis Mayweather, Opportunistic Sergeant
effect: Human
• Anthropology • Security

MACO. When this personnel is an eligible target for a
random selection, if you have no cards in hand, you may
exclude a [Sflt] personnel present from that selection.
"I'd like to be the first to congratulate you on a brilliant strategy. I'm certain that in years to come ..."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 4 CUNNING 6 STRENGTH 6

name: Tuvok, Coldly Logical Soldier
effect: Vulcan
• Intelligence • Programming • Security

When you download a card, if you command an [Alt] personnel
and you have not downloaded a card titled Tuvok this turn,
you may also download this personnel. (This ability may be used while this personnel is in your deck.)
"Nonetheless, logic dictates caution in the face of a superior enemy."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 6 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 7

name: Tykk
effect: Breen Warship Class

You may play your Breen personnel aboard this ship.
When a Breen personnel aboard this ship is involved in an
engagement you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel with a
cost of 4 or more from hand aboard this ship.
The Breen developed technology to the point where their enemies could not cope with their brutal attacks.
attributes: • Attributes: RANGE 8 WEAPONS 9 SHIELDS 9

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Battleship
effect: Galaxy Class

When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may
score 5 points.
"She was the first Galaxy-Class warship built by the Federation. Forty-two decks. Capable of transporting over six thousand troops."

effect: Excelsior Class

This ship is attributes +2 for each corresponding

"Someone's been upgrading the Lakota's weapons. That's a lot of firepower for an Excelsior-class ship."

"I was ... getting bored."

name: Unimatrix Zero
effect:
To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When you play this event, for each unique Borg personnel you command, this event is cost -1. Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn. Each unique personnel you command gains [Alt].

"Assimilate you. Yes, but that's nothing to be afraid of. You like having friends, don't you? Assimilation turns us all into friends."

name: Vorta Experiment Tables
effect:
To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel.
Plays in your core. Each personnel you own who costs 4 or
more gains [Alt]. When you complete a mission that requires
Cunning, you may score 5 points.

"...a little experiment. To see how they'd respond to an attempt by the Dominion to gain a foothold in the Alpha Quadrant."

name: Watch Dog
effect:
To play this event, you must command three [Alt] [Stft] personnel. Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may play interrupts on this event as if they were in hand.
Order — Place an interrupt from hand on this event.

"Don't mind Porthos. He hasn't had his dinner yet."

name: Wesley Crusher, Battleship Helmsman
effect: Human

• Astrometrics • Engineer • Navigation
• Officer • Physics • Programming
While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, the ship this personnel is aboard is attributes +1 and this personnel gains Geology and Science.
"Long-range scans have picked up Klingon battle cruisers, Captain. They are on an intercept course."
attributes: • Attributes: INTEGRITY 5 CUNNING 7 STRENGTH 5

effect: Vorta

• Diplomacy • Honor • Intelligence • Law
• Security • Leadership

When you play this personnel, if you command a Law personnel, he is cost -1. When a personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.
"I no longer consider myself a member of the Dominion."
